Audia 0.2.0

Audia 0.2.0 is a major alpha update focused on faster daily use, cleaner controls, better media handling, and stronger stability across mixer workflows.

New and Improved

  • Major redesign of Settings and menubar surfaces with cleaner structure and improved navigation.
  • Compact and Advanced menu experiences with section reordering, visibility controls, and default-open behavior.
  • Detached panel presentation with improved dismissal/position handling.
  • Better onboarding flow with clearer feature walkthrough and browser-related setup guidance.

Mixer and Audio Controls

  • Improved per-app and master control responsiveness with refined throttling and smoother UI updates.
  • Better mute/zero-volume behavior to match native macOS expectations.
  • Improved default-volume application behavior and stronger mute state consistency.
  • Improved recording app visibility logic with grace-window handling for active audio sources.

Device Routing and Input

  • Better output/input device control paths and reliability across app and global routing.
  • Improved multi-device behavior in compact controls and safer option availability in unsupported scenarios.
  • Input shortcut support improvements with better action handling and automation behavior.
  • Auto-mute rule UX and settings improvements, including app selection/search refinements.

Media and Now Playing

  • Expanded now-playing support and improved reliability when switching active media apps.
  • Improved preferred-player behavior and automatic fallback handling when unavailable.
  • Better transport/state controls with more consistent feedback in the UI.

HUD and Visual Feedback

  • New custom HUD refinements with improved icon resolution and device-aware visuals.
  • Better app/device icon handling across Bluetooth, built-in, and external device scenarios.
  • Improved large-value rendering, quantization behavior, and style previews.
  • Multiple visual polish updates for alignment, spacing, hit-testing, and animation quality.

Shortcuts and App Intents

  • Expanded App Intents and shortcut controls for key audio actions.
  • Better parameter handling and intent consistency for slider-based controls.
  • Reliability fixes for intent-triggered actions and settings sync behavior.

Stability and Reliability

  • Broad performance and responsiveness improvements across mixer and panel interactions.
  • Fixes for panel resize flicker and close/dismiss edge cases.
  • Reliability updates for launch/focus behavior and window presentation flow.
  • Additional hardening for edge cases in core UI interactions.
